clause.heading: Contract Termination
clause.description: Either party may terminate with 30 days written notice without cause

clause.heading: Payment Terms
clause.description: Monthly payments of $10,000 due within 30 days of invoice

clause.heading: Limitation of Liability
clause.description: Liability capped at total contract value with mutual indemnification

clause.heading: Auto-Renewal Clause
clause.description: Contract automatically renews for one year unless terminated with notice

clause.heading: Service Level Agreement
clause.description: 99.9% uptime guarantee with defined response times for support
